titles.title: Encouraging recognition, and supporting the goals and ideals, of National Aphasia Awareness Month.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1425)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
6/27/2007--Introduced.
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Aphasia Awareness Month.
